About Me

Grounded and solution-oriented with commitment for professionalism, work prioritization and ability to multitask. Experienced in working at various stages of front-end development life cycle, such as research, inspiration, vision & ideas, brain storming and mock design, design and code.

Ability to function as a Team player, Time management, Planning, Organizing, Interpersonal skills , working and acting under pressure with discretion. Adept at motivating self and others with positive attitude.
